overview:
Justin Kamm is a Partner at Crown Predator Holdings.

Crown Predator Holdings (“CPH”) has the freedom to pursue all types of investment opportunities across the entire spectrum of industries, capital structures and styles. Flexible capital permits CPH to lead and/or co-invest in transactions across all dimensions of the following:

  • Industries/Sectors
  • Segment of Capital Structure
  • Control/Active Minority/Passive Minority
  • Early Stage VC/Later Stage VC/Growth Capital/Leveraged Transactions
  • Short/Medium/Long Term Investment Horizons

Through an extensive, global network of relationships, CPH frequently can provide more than just capital. As desired by the management teams with whom CPH partners, CPH has helped:

  • Develop and support new growth strategies
  • Seek out, support and execute add-on acquisitions
  • Recruit high quality board members
  • Strengthen management teams
  • Support technology and infrastructure upgrades
  • Support increased research and development
  • Make high level sales contacts on the portfolio company’s behalf
  • Facilitate Wall Street coverage and support
  • Access additional sources and types of capital

CPH considers special situations and welcomes reviewing opportunities that do not easily fit into traditional investment categories.
